content.text:
I can see that `.coverage` is not currently in the `.gitignore` file. I'll add it to the Python section since it's a coverage report file generated by Python testing tools.

<replace_in_file>
<path>.gitignore</path>
<diff>
------- SEARCH
# Python
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*$py.class
=======
# Python
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*$py.class
.coverage
+++++++ REPLACE
</diff>
</replace_in_file>
